DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , PK ( Pharmacokinetics ) single oral dos JTT-251 healthy type 2 diabetes mellitus subject evaluate effect food PK JTT-251 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Single Oral JTT-251 Doses Healthy Type 2 Diabetic Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Subject Cohorts : Healthy male female subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 19.0 31.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Type 2 Diabetic Subject Cohorts : Male female Type 2 diabetic subject diagnose least 3 month BMI 25 40 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Have glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) > 6.5 % ≤10.9 % ( inclusive ) treatment naïve respect hypoglycemic agent OR > 6.5 % ≤10.0 % ( inclusive ) treat metformin Healthy Subject Cohorts : Known clinically relevant history presence significant respiratory , gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , hematological , lymphatic , neurological , cardiovascular , psychiatric , musculoskeletal , genitourinary , immunological , metabolic , dermatological connective tissue disease Subjects systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg Type 2 Diabetic Subject Cohorts : Subjects know medical history presence type 1 diabetes mellitus Subjects know medical history acute metabolic diabetic complication Subjects uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg document ongoing treatment )
